channel.title: T?ku Reo

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit M?lama Loko Ea Foundation and Whakarewarewa Living Village. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Nomad
channel.desc: Kahu and Piri Wiri Tua trek into Haast to learn survival skills from isolated legend "Beansprout" Robert Long, before heading to Wai Kaha Jade, where Kahu carves a gifted stone with carver Arepa Tata. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Kiwi The Knight And The Qashqai
channel.desc: Anna Williams is New Zealand's only know Oriental rug repairer. She learnt her trade in the bazaars of Iran, Turkey, and Egypt. Unusual for a ?foreigner', she stays and works with the Qashqai nomads, honing her weaving and repairing skills. Here, where repairing is traditionally a man's job, and Anna is a curiosity when sitting with men in the bazaars. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: House of Champions
channel.desc: Celebrating the differences amongst us and the threads that bind us together. Three flatmates are striving for Special Olympics glory. Can they beat the odds or will life get in the way? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tagata Pasifika 2025
channel.desc: The show made by Pacific people, for Pacific people - The Pacific voice on New Zealand television since 1987. (R).

channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: T?ku Reo

channel.title: Molly Of Denali
channel.desc: The daily adventures of 10-year-old Alaska native Molly Mabray, her family, her dog Suki and her friends Tooey and Trini.

channel.title: P?kana 2025

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Huhu - Te Tunga R?kau
channel.desc: Huhu is a show for preschoolders, featuring reo M?ori stories and highlighting M?ori perspectives. 6 tapes (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: When an old ponaturi warrior outsmarts the group and escapes, Rangi blames herself and dives into the dangerous waters to follow it to its underwater lair. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: Still trying to make up for her mistake, Rangi calls on mysterious friends in the mist to help them trick the ponaturi and get the godstick back. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Nan are approached by Grace who offers to buy the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Nan falls sick so Marama and N?kau return to look after Tai and the farm. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pamu Kumara
channel.desc: Tai and her superhuman wh?nau run their local vege shop from their k?mara farm. Tai and Amaia devise a plan to bust Nan out of hospital. (R).

channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and education K?hungahunga and Kura Tuatahi audiences. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Chatham Islanders
channel.desc: These remote islands have a profoundly beautiful and devastatingly sad history that is still felt today. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing
channel.desc: Presenter Nore Martin shows when and where to fish according to the M?ori lunar calendar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Native Ride
channel.desc: A handful of unforgettable M?ori characters stride out on a 100-day quest to tame a totally wild Ruatahuna horse for a grand competition in this stunning and poignant series. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Michif Country
channel.desc: A glimpse into the St. Laurent M?tis nation on Lake Manitoba, taking viewers on a journey with the most active and talented hunters, trappers, and fishermen in the community.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer, Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is on the hunt for red deer along the banks of the Motu river located north of Matawai. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: East Coast Rising
channel.desc: Hosea takes the team to a marae in order to reconnect and regroup ahead of the big grudge match against Poverty Bay. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the story behind the original name of Mokoia island, ?Te Motu Tapu a Tinirau?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Takaro Tribe
channel.desc: T??karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa R??kau, Pond K?k??, P? and Waea Wao live.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kia Mau
channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tamariki Haka
channel.desc: Children from kura across the country showcase their haka skills. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mataora Digital
channel.desc: Amazing content curated for rangatahi, wh?nau and pakeke. Made by the Mataora team. (R).

channel.desc: Tamariki learn well-known waiata and haka from Ng? Puna o Waiorea, Te Wharekura o Hoani Waititi Marae and Te Wharekura o R?kaumangamanga. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pathfinders
channel.desc: Master carver James Rickard takes us deeper into his gift, the people and life experiences that shaped him revealing the man behind the craft and one of our most prestigious carvers. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Go behind the scenes with each kura tuarua and discover Haka Theatre, a thrilling fusion of kapa haka, theatre, haka movement, and storytelling. Autaia is presented by Hawaiki T? in partnership with Auckland Live. M?ngere's story is one of resilience, representing their vibrant community and the strength of wh?nau. This story is also a tribute to Wh?ea Frida, whose memory anchors their performance. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: Go behind the scenes with each kura tuarua and discover Haka Theatre, a thrilling fusion of kapa haka, theatre, haka movement, and storytelling. Autaia is presented by Hawaiki T? in partnership with Auckland Live. A high-energy showcase of M?ngere pride, grounded in te re, tikanga, and an emotional tribute to the memory of Wh?ea Frida. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Jordyn With A Why as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. H?ni Totorewa shares key lessons he has learn't during his career. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Going Native
channel.desc: Drew travels to Canada?s largest urban woodlot to meet ?Sawmill Sid?, a carver transforming the urban landscape, then he visits an Inuit artist who is bringing the North south, lastly he meets a statue-maker who casts his own bronze.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Cree musician Kris Harper embraces his family?s artistic legacy and for the first time creates a song using the poetry of his late mother. Directed by Conor McNally.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: 16-member wh?nau, Te Wh?nau M?nihera, changed their lives when they turned to te ao M?ori; finding all the answers to heal their whakapapa & deal with daily challenges we all face. In this episode we ask who?s the best singer; and Whaea Tere lies to her wh?nau. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: H?kina Te M?nuka
channel.desc: As the OCD cleaner of the wh?nau, Whaea Hinemoa struggles with how the wh?nau ?clean? the whare. M?m? Jaz examples how she pronounced te reo M?ori, when she attended kura in T?maki. And a glimpse into the life the wh?nau once lived. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M?huhu o te Rangi
channel.desc: We look back on M?huhu o te Rangi (Aotearoa?s largest waka taua), its voyages on the Waitemat?, and its place within the iwi. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Build
channel.desc: We explore the build itself from the first sketch on the r?kau to the final chisel strike. It will be based in Whang?rei, where master carver and waka builder Heemi Eruera will work his magic. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).
